description: Made with Mountain Hardwear's Dry.Q™ Active technology, the Stretch Ozonic™ Pant is a lightweight, high-performance 2.5-layer shell that excels on rugged trails in difficult, wet conditions. Because when you're transitioning from cityscape to mountainside scouting out boulders, you've got enough to plan for, and having one pair of pants in your pack that can handle it all?that's one less problem you have to solve.
name: Mountain Hardwear Stretch Ozonic Pants, Long - Mens
